12.name: wordpress/simple-share-for-chinese-social-sites
12.description: This is a simplified version of the Sinoshare plugin with 40 sharing options. I have converted the plugin so it runs as jQuery instead of Prototype. After installation, you will see a 分享此文章 at the end of the content. Next version will include a shortcode and more configuration options. Support is provided at my blog. You can also view plugin info and download it at the plugin page
